about_the_game:
In this platformer unlike any you’ve seen before, you’re gonna have to learn to manage your lives like a true demon !
It’s no big deal, only a few seconds long levels to run through.

Although, down under here, contracts are everything and you’re going to have to work with it…
And in the underworld, when you make a pact, you need to take responsibility!





Jumping, rolling, gliding, that’s all good and dandy… But let’s be honest: without my demonic shop, where the only valid currency is your lives, you stand no chance of overcoming the Ossuary!
Or even the Abyss.
Nor the Inferno…
You have no shot in Evil Industries!
Don’t even think of clearing Chateau Satan!!



All these bonuses and curses available in the shop, if you’re willing to spend or gain lives, define the difficulty you set up for yourself on the current level. Put it simply: you’re betting with yourself that you’ll succeed with no bonus, or even with a few curses… or not! (I’m betting on the latter)





Anyway… let’s suppose you actually make it (unlikely), you’ll still need enough stamina and bravery to take things with a new angle and attempt speedrunning!
Know what I mean? Dodging spikes, outsmarting minions, leap over sticky tar, overcome giant blade traps, and so on, to finally beat the creator’s best times. Just thinking that you might ever achieve this makes me laugh!



I mean, there’s over 50 levels. Quite a lot of replayability too, depending on what you’re going to pick from the shop!
No bragging, but we did manage to make high level speedrunners rage during playtesting.
A few of those even shed some tears…

And if you think you’re done after a single run, we’ve got plenty of other contracts waiting to be signed, with some spicy new challenges added to all those levels!

Don’t worry, we won’t mind if you’re ready to give up on the very first level.
Just, maybe, don’t mention it to your friends, it is the tutorial after all…

  • OS *: Microsoft 64bit Windows 7
  • Processor: 64 bit Intel compatible Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 4-compliant onboard graphics
  • DirectX: Version 11

Recommended:
  • OS: Microsoft 64bit Windows 10

short_description: Gamble your lives in this fast-paced, hard-as-hell precision platformer, and overcome countless devilish traps across five realms of carefully handcrafted levels. Having trouble? Spend a few souls to gain formidable powers... Or handicap yourself with some curses.
